PageWidgetPortable.Title: Em aprovação
PageWidgetPortable.Subtitle: >> Orçament
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <CanDelete>false</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>false</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>false</CanInsert> <EntityViewName>PORTAL_INT_APROVAR_VERBAS_ORCAMENTARIAS.GRID</EntityViewName> <Mode>1</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>true</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>1</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>A.EMPRESA = @EMPRESA AND ((A.GRUPOASSINATURAS IN (SELECT C.HANDLE FROM CP_GRUPOALCADASINTEGRANTES B, CP_GRUPOALCADAS C WHERE B.GRUPO = C.HANDLE AND ((C.EHHIERARQUIA = 'S' AND B.SEQUENCIA >= A.SEQUENCIAALCADA) OR (C.EHHIERARQUIA <> 'S' AND B.SEQUENCIA = A.SEQUENCIAALCADA)) AND B.USUARIO = @USUARIO AND B.ATIVO = 'S')) OR (A.GRUPOASSINATURAS IN (SELECT D.GRUPO FROM CP_GRUPOALCADASUSUARIOS D, CP_GRUPOALCADASINTEGRANTES I, CP_GRUPOALCADAS G WHERE D.GRUPO = G.HANDLE AND I.GRUPO = G.HANDLE AND I.HANDLE = D.INTEGRANTE AND ((G.EHHIERARQUIA = 'S' AND I.SEQUENCIA >= A.SEQUENCIAALCADA) OR (G.EHHIERARQUIA = 'N' AND I.SEQUENCIA = A.SEQUENCIAALCADA)) AND D.USUARIOAUTORIZADO = @USUARIO AND I.USUARIO = D.USUARIO AND D.ATIVO = 'S' AND I.ATIVO = 'S' AND I.AUSENTE = 'S'))) AND A.STATUS = 1</UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <FormUrl>~/PortalInterno/e/Orcamento/AprovarAjusteOcamentario.aspx</FormUrl> <ShowExport>true</ShowExport> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>

PageWidgetPortable.Title: Recusado
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <CanDelete>false</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>false</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>false</CanInsert> <EntityViewName>CT_ORCAMENTOAPROVACOES.PORTAL_INT_RECUSADO_VERBAS_ORCAMENTARIAS.GRID</EntityViewName> <Mode>1</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>true</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>0</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>A.EMPRESA = @EMPRESA AND ((A.GRUPOASSINATURAS IN (SELECT C.HANDLE FROM CP_GRUPOALCADASINTEGRANTES B, CP_GRUPOALCADAS C WHERE B.GRUPO = C.HANDLE AND ((C.EHHIERARQUIA = 'S' AND B.SEQUENCIA >= A.SEQUENCIAALCADA) OR (C.EHHIERARQUIA <> 'S' AND B.SEQUENCIA = A.SEQUENCIAALCADA)) AND B.USUARIO = @USUARIO AND B.ATIVO = 'S')) OR (A.GRUPOASSINATURAS IN (SELECT D.GRUPO FROM CP_GRUPOALCADASUSUARIOS D, CP_GRUPOALCADASINTEGRANTES I, CP_GRUPOALCADAS G WHERE D.GRUPO = G.HANDLE AND I.GRUPO = G.HANDLE AND I.HANDLE = D.INTEGRANTE AND ((G.EHHIERARQUIA = 'S' AND I.SEQUENCIA >= A.SEQUENCIAALCADA) OR (G.EHHIERARQUIA = 'N' AND I.SEQUENCIA = A.SEQUENCIAALCADA)) AND D.USUARIOAUTORIZADO = @USUARIO AND I.USUARIO = D.USUARIO AND D.ATIVO = 'S' AND I.ATIVO = 'S' AND I.AUSENTE = 'S'))) AND A.STATUS = 3</UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <FormUrl>~/PortalInterno/e/Orcamento/RecusarAjusteOcamentario.aspx</FormUrl> <ShowExport>true</ShowExport> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>

PageWidgetPortable.Title: Todos
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <CanDelete>false</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>false</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>false</CanInsert> <EntityViewName>CT_ORCAMENTOAPROVACOES.PORTAL_INT_TODOS_VERBAS_ORCAMENTARIAS.GRID</EntityViewName> <Mode>1</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>0</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>A.EMPRESA = @EMPRESA AND ((A.GRUPOASSINATURAS IN (SELECT C.HANDLE FROM CP_GRUPOALCADASINTEGRANTES B, CP_GRUPOALCADAS C WHERE B.GRUPO = C.HANDLE AND ((C.EHHIERARQUIA = 'S' AND B.SEQUENCIA >= A.SEQUENCIAALCADA) OR (C.EHHIERARQUIA <> 'S' AND B.SEQUENCIA = A.SEQUENCIAALCADA)) AND B.USUARIO = @USUARIO AND B.ATIVO = 'S')) OR (A.GRUPOASSINATURAS IN (SELECT D.GRUPO FROM CP_GRUPOALCADASUSUARIOS D, CP_GRUPOALCADASINTEGRANTES I, CP_GRUPOALCADAS G WHERE D.GRUPO = G.HANDLE AND I.GRUPO = G.HANDLE AND I.HANDLE = D.INTEGRANTE AND ((G.EHHIERARQUIA = 'S' AND I.SEQUENCIA >= A.SEQUENCIAALCADA) OR (G.EHHIERARQUIA = 'N' AND I.SEQUENCIA = A.SEQUENCIAALCADA)) AND D.USUARIOAUTORIZADO = @USUARIO AND I.USUARIO = D.USUARIO AND D.ATIVO = 'S' AND I.ATIVO = 'S' AND I.AUSENTE = 'S'))) </UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <FormUrl>~/PortalInterno/e/Orcamento/TodosAjusteOcamentario.aspx</FormUrl> <ShowExport>true</ShowExport> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>
